CustomField.description: This value is part of the Scorecard calculation that indicates whether you have enough opportunities in your current pipeline. It features in the formula: Total Current Pipeline Goal = Annual Plan Target x Current Opportunity Multiplier
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This value is part of the Scorecard calculation that indicates whether you have enough opportunities in your current pipeline. It features in the formula: Total Current Pipeline Goal = Annual Plan Target x Current Opportunity Multiplier
CustomField.label: Current Opportunity Multiplier
